CustomField.description: Biz should be prompted to enter the reason for de-linkage of a valid GTM partner assignment. The reason should be entered only if there is "DELETION""of a valid "GTM partner assignmÃ«nt" in the direct account page.The validation rule""GTMPartnerAssignRemoval_ReasonMandatory_" will make sure that a reason is entered only if there is the removal of a valid GTM assignment.The field should be history tracked.
CustomField.label: De-linkage Reason
